metadata.name: Young Wolf HERO! and Blue Moon AI creat Fun Art
metadata.description:
This is unofficial, AI created Fun art.  X2E-HEROES #007's name is Garm.  Garm is our beloved hero character.

We are distributing an NFT artwork inspired by a werewolf. 
The artwork depicts a werewolf and a full moon. The werewolf is a young man (around 26 years old) who struggles between his beastly instincts and his human conscience. This represents the difficulty of the idea that "we are always our own worst enemy." The theme of the artwork is that the young, immature werewolf is not yet capable of becoming his own enemy. The artwork will be distributed through free minting, and a total of 5,400 tokens will be issued, each without any utility function. We do not expect any secondary market value for this artwork, and therefore, do not encourage its circulation in the market.
